price: Na hakika Mola wako Mlezi ndiye Mwenye nguvu Mwenye kurehemu.
footnotes: Na hakika hapana shaka Mola wako Mlezi ni Muweza wa kuwaadhibu wanao kadhibisha, naye ni Mfadhili wa watu wema kwa neema nyingi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
